description:
Schedule:
6:30-7:00 - Networking & Refreshments
7:00-7:15 - Sponsor Intro & Position Looking
7:15-7:30 - Lighting Talk
7:30-9:00* - Featured Talk

* Hard stop at 9 but may end earlier

Lighting Talk: //BUILD// 2016 with Max Palmer
Microsoft Build 2016 has come and gone but we have someone who was there to let you know everything they saw and heard.

Featured Talk: Life as a contractor with Duncan Thomson
A talk on the risks and rewards of contracting, looking for new contracts, starting out and some of the useful skills to develop.

About Duncan:
Duncan has worked as a .NET and database contractor for over 2 years, mostly in Southwest of England. Duncan is currently trying to learn R and takes part in many of the meetups in and around Exeter. Soon he hopes to have time to look into the automation of online resources for tabletop gaming.

Meeting Sponsors:
DNV GL

Don't forget to follow us on Twitter at @dotnetsouthwest for news and updates.

location.address: 1 Linear Park, Avon Street, Temple Quay, BS2 0PS
location.name: DNV GL

title: Life as a Contractor with Duncan Thomson
